news.headline: Mahindra & Mahindra Q4 FY25 Net Profit Rises 20% to ₹3,295 Crore
news.text: Mahindra & Mahindra reported a 20% year-on-year increase in consolidated net profit for Q4 FY25, reaching ₹3,295 crore. Revenue for the quarter grew by 20% to ₹42,599 crore, driven by strong performance in the automotive segment, which saw a 24% increase in revenue to ₹25,902 crore.

news.headline: Mahindra & Mahindra Declares ₹25.3 per Share Dividend for FY25
news.text: The board of Mahindra & Mahindra declared a dividend of ₹25.3 per share for FY25, reflecting the company's robust financial performance and commitment to shareholder returns.

news.headline: Mahindra & Mahindra's Consolidated Revenue Grows 14% to ₹1,59,211 Crore in FY25
news.text: For the full fiscal year FY25, Mahindra & Mahindra recorded consolidated revenue of ₹1,59,211 crore, a 14% increase over the previous year. The company's consolidated profit after tax stood at ₹14,073 crore, marking a 20% year-on-year growth.

news.headline: Mahindra & Mahindra Share Price Shows Volatility Amid Market Fluctuations
news.text: As of May 12, 2025, Mahindra & Mahindra's share price experienced fluctuations, trading around ₹3,048.15. The stock has seen varied movements over the past week, reflecting broader market trends and investor sentiment.
